title: Analyze Marketing Campaign Performance
description: A week after a campaign launch, a marketer wants to analyze its performance.

tasks.description: Identify the marketing campaign to be analyzed.
Retrieve key performance metrics for the campaign, such as email open rate, click-through rate, conversion rate, and revenue generated.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls all relevant metrics from the analytics platform.

tasks.description: Generate a report summarizing the campaign's performance against its goals.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a clear report showing the campaign's success or failure.
